Getting started¶

In this guide you will learn how to quickly get started using the NetQASM SDK and to run your applications on a simulator of a quantum network. Before continuing, make sure you have followed the Installation. We will be using the simulator NetSquid, for which we also need SquidASM, also see Installation. To make sure that you’re ready to go run

python3 -c "import squidasm; print(squidasm.__version__)"

In the next part, Running your first app, we will run our first app.
